bioAsHtml: I'm a Computer Science graduate who joined the Guardian 2 years ago. I've changed teams 3 times, experimenting with different technologies and programming languages. For the last year I've been focusing mainly on learning Scala and functional programming.

acceptedTalks.title: The Path to Generic Endpoints using Shapeless
